subject: Baseball
Ponzi Schemes
Bankruptcies
Decisions and Verdicts
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Jed S. Rakoff could dismiss all or part of the $1 billion lawsuit brought against the Mets’ owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz in connection to the Madoff Ponzi scheme.
snippet: Jed S. Rakoff could dismiss all or part of the $1 billion lawsuit brought against the Mets’ owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz in connection to the Madoff Ponzi scheme.
